Reviews.Title: Fantastic Phone, from a fantastic seller
Reviews.Author: Flipphonez
Reviews.Content: Amazing phone! I'm not into smart phones or texting phones, so it's hard to find flip phones that are in great condition. This phone is perfect though. Great camera, great sound and voice quality, and it's shock and water safe. If you have a Samsung Flipshot and are trying to upgrade it, go for this one. Buy from JustCellular BTW.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Phone!
Reviews.Author: KernersvilleMom
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  Easy to keep looking new!  It doesn't scratch easily.  Requires no extra data plan with Verizon.Nice looking photographs.  Great for texting. Wonderful phone!I purchased this phone for my son because it offered not only the features he wanted but, also, a low SAR rating -My criteria. Little did I know what a perfect phone it would be for a 15 year old young man!  Wow!  Rough, rugged, keeps a good charge, and....He has washed and dried it twice in the pocket of his jeans, and it took a dive with him when he was pushed into the pool.  (After the dunking, it was still powered on and working. Amazing. He turned it off, took out the battery, and dried it by placing it in a baggie of dried rice for a day.) The interior of the battery compartment never showed moisture.  Now, while I can't guarantee such satisfaction for you, I can say that it has been a PERFECT phone for him!  Wow!It was definitely MONEY WELL-SPENT for me!  :-D  (Knowing how many other phones he has been through...lol)

Reviews.Title: More of a thank you than a review
Reviews.Author: B. Hennessy
Reviews.Content: I have owned this phone, from a brand new activation at a Verizon store, for almost four years now. I remember thinking when I got it that it seemed cheap, light, and plasticky. It has lasted more than twice as long as any other cell phone I have owned to this date. It still has the original battery, that still holds a useful charge for a full day with heavy use, two days or more with light use, even after four years. The camera still works today like the day I got it, with a nice clear lens despite four years of pocked wear and dozens of drops. I have put it through the washing machine (though not the dryer) and it came out with not a hiccup. Didn't even bother with the whole rice thing. Just toweled it off and put it back in my pocket. It has been under a flooded house with me while plumbing, where my work phone (a rugedized Motorola) came out with water damage right away, and the Casio was unaffected.I have taken and saved thousands of pictures and hundreds of movies with it, most memorably in Kauai. My pictures of sunset at Kee'ee lagoon stand up pretty damn well to ones taken by a friend on a high end SLR (at Facebook resolution anyway).It is getting to the point where a smart phone of some sort is probably unavoidable in my near future. I really don't want to though, since I want to see exactly how long this thing will go. The Casio engineers really outdid themselves on this one.Nokias have the reputation of being indestructible. This phone really gives them a run for the money, while also being just a great quality phone and camera. So thank you to the Casio engineers and manufacturers, I more than got my money's worth out of this phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone, but it only holds 500 contacts and verizon no longer supports this phone because it is several years old
Reviews.Author: Dean Pearson
Reviews.Content: Only holds 500 contactsverizon no longer supports this phone because it its an older phone.I had to manual install most of my contacts

Reviews.Title: One of the best basic phones ever made
Reviews.Author: N. Smith "verified vino votary"
Reviews.Content: I'm just upgrading to a smartphone after having had the Exilim for over 2 years and I can safely say that this phone has been the most reliable I've ever had.  To echo the comments of other reviewers; this phone has a great camera, excellent battery life and is very user-friendly.  To boot, this phone has the best call quality of any phone I've ever owned (and that includes my new fancy smartphone).  It's been an excellent phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, Very Reliable.
Reviews.Author: M. Sharpe "Ghostbusters!"
Reviews.Content: the title says it all. I've had this phone for 2 years and everything has worked flawlessly from day one. I can't say the camera is wonderful like the phone but it's good since you can put a micro SD card in it.The best thing about this phone to me is that I don't have to wait for the menu to load or things I click on to load like my other dinky phone. Pretty convenient to have the phone sorta transform into a camera and a video camera as well. It makes either "message" videos or some other type of video, I forget what it's called. those are a little better quality and a lot bigger so not as many will fit on the actual phone which is where the SD card comes into play.This phone has ALWAYS worked and has great, clear sounding calls. Everything on this phone has always worked. when i get an upgrade I will be getting another one.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: D_Review
Reviews.Content: Received phone very quickly and in good shape. Was a little disappointed that it was supposed to be new and appeared to come in a refurbished plain white box. The phone was in good shape and good working order, so I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Sil
Reviews.Content: I like this camera phone it makes calls good and pixs too and the people sold it to me were the best to work with. They did every thing to make me happy and they sure did!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: carolina38
Reviews.Content: Works well and takes great photos. Is very durable. Micro SD card needed to take advantage of high res camera.

Reviews.Title: Plagued with problems, unfortunately
Reviews.Author: Gfthomas
Reviews.Content: Perhaps I just got a bad one, but for clarification, I did purchase a brand new one, not refurbished, or used in like-new condition. I really do wish it worked though because it's a cool idea for a phone. For one, a picture was sent to this phone from an iphone, and the memory just couldn't handle it. The preview page in My Pictures froze up every time, and when I tried deleting the picture from the Memory tab under Phone Settings, it couldn't delete it either. Also, the camera, which is the main reason I got this phone, would also freeze and cause the phone to restart.

Reviews.Title: seller is impossible to deal with !!!YEUK HOTANG
Reviews.Author: william barnes
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my son. when I found out his step father had bought him a smart phone I was upset but, I tried to return the phone since it was never used never turned on to the seller but he decided that it was my fault and should keep the phone . SO THIS IS FOR ANYONE WHO FINDS THIS DEALER ON AMAZON AND THINKS HE'S SOMEONE YOU WANT TO DEAL WITH,,,DON'T. even after explaining my situation he decided not to answer my email .

Reviews.Title: Okay for a few years
Reviews.Author: Jesse Ahmann "Uncle"
Reviews.Content: I had a few disappointments with this phone right away.  The camera for being 5.1 megapixels really didn't capture good clarity.  I've taken better photos with 3.1.  Next the text message limit is 250.  Really???  The contacts are limited also.  The dock charger failed after 6 months, so I just had to use the wall charger.  I gave this to my girlfriend after her phone died.  Then more problems started.  Whenever she tried to use the camera, the phone restarted.  Also, the wall charger input gave out, cheap design.  Get something different.

Reviews.Title: terrible sale
Reviews.Author: AZYogi
Reviews.Content: I loved my model of this phone so when it broke I looked for another one. I bought this one as it was marked "like new", but it is basically broken. It won't register calls or show missed calls until 24 hours later. It won't keep time. The person that sold it to me did not clear the memory or get it ready to have it activated. I would not recommend this seller.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: C.W.
Reviews.Content: use it for work, can get around corners and take pictures of things normally not seen. nifty thing. not into smart phones at this time. I use my computer at home. I think im saving around $1,200  a year in usage charges.

Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim C721 Verizon 5.1 MP Camera Phone
Reviews.Author: desrtroz
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a replacement for my son's broken phone. Arrived well-packaged and works perfectly.  It was an exact replacement for the one he had before.  Thanks for the great deal!

Reviews.Title: Yea!
Reviews.Author: Shirl
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this phone, and was THRILLED to find this re-furbished one! Didn't really want a used one, so Thank You!!

Reviews.Title: Is ok
Reviews.Author: CRodz
Reviews.Content: Is just ok... A simple flip cellphone good for people that don't pay attention to pocket / purse dialing and things like that..

Reviews.Title: One of the best I've had
Reviews.Author: Nanadoc
Reviews.Content: I got one of these from verizon more than a year ago and dropped it in a parking lot.Either I or someone else ran over it. When I called my own number a lady who pickedit up answered. It still worked but the screen did not. I was excited when I found I couldorder another from Amazon. It is brand new and works like a charm and is super toughand waterproof. I would buy another one for a spare if I could get it.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: Michelle Hagen
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement to my original. I love this phone. I live in the middle of nowhere and I still get reception and it takes beautiful pictures.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!
Reviews.Author: ChrisP1019
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for four years before it finally broke, it was dunked multiple times, dropped off of multiple surfaces, it survived a multitude of teenage boys and was even run over by my sister's truck and the only thing that broke was the camera! It finally broke after being dogpiled on! I'm definitely going to buy another one! It can hold a charge for up to three days and charges quickly, it is easy to use and takes fantastic pictures!

ProductInfo.Features:
Bluetooth Connectivity - Take your talking to the next level with a Bluetooth wireless headset.
meets military specs for: water immersion, humidity, salt-fog, shock, vibration, dust, sun, altitude, temperature
Unique twisting display that orientates from Portrait to Landscape view.
5.1 Megapixel Camera with Dual LED Flash and Auto-Focus technology
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No contract Required
ProductInfo.Name: Casio Hitachi Exilim C721 Verizon 5.1MP Camera Phone.
